name: Find-The-Line
summary:
Transform simple lines into works of art with the swipe of a finger in this unique and beautiful puzzle game.

Moving each line is easy as you look for clues in each line’s movement and piece them together to craft everything from household objects to iconic monuments.
info:
• 别名: Find The Line
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 发行日期: 2015-07-09
  • 售价: $2.99
  • 官方网站: http://www.chillingo.com/about/game-faqs/
